core:description.text: A shallow, sturdy wash basin with a thick rim and a few honest chips from hard use. It holds a pool of clear water meant for rinsing blood and grit—cool to the touch, with a faint film of soap-scum and silt that catches the light when the basin is disturbed.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: Flat, lukewarm water with a dusty mineral tang—old clay, a hint of iron, and the faint bite of stale soap. Not unsafe-looking, just unmistakably "wash water."
